definition: خد kadda u to furrow, plow (a the ground) V to be furrowed; to become wrinkled (akin) خد kadd pl. خدود kudūd cheek; lateral portion, side │صعر خده ṣa‘‘ra kaddahū to put on a contemptuous mien خد kadd and خدة kudda pl. خدد kudad furrow, ridge, groove, rut خد mikadda pl. مخاد makadd2 cushion, pillow; seat cushion
